Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. This represents a significant savings compared to the market rate and a great opportunity for you to maximize your investment. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you every step of the way. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
